XSize.description: A node for setting image width and height dimensions

XImageSave.description: An image save node with custom path and filename tokens support

filename_prefix.name: Filename Prefix
filename_prefix.tooltip: Filename prefix with support for tokens like %date%, %time%, %seed%, etc.

use_custom_path.name: Use Custom Folder
use_custom_path.tooltip: Whether to use a custom folder

folder.name: Custom Folder Name
folder.tooltip: Custom save folder, supports creating subfolders like: Character/Female

add_folder_sequence.name: Add Folder Sequence Number
add_folder_sequence.tooltip: Automatically add sequence number to custom folder name if it doesn't already have one (e.g., Image_00001)

XLoadLatent.description: A node for loading latent files from the output directory

filepath_input.name: Custom Path and Filename (Priority)
filepath_input.tooltip: Manually specify latent file in Output directory (e.g., Latents/ComfyUI/ComfyUI.latent), takes priority over dropdown list selection

XSaveLatent.description: A node for saving latent tensors with options for numbered or non-numbered filenames

filename_prefix.name: Filename
filename_prefix.tooltip: Filename prefix for the saved latent file

save_path.name: Save Path
save_path.tooltip: Manually specify custom save path for latent in Output directory (e.g., Latents/ComfyUI)

number_padding.name: File Name With Numbering
number_padding.tooltip: Whether to add numbering to the filename to prevent overwriting (e.g., abc_00001.latent vs abc.latent)

1.name: Path and Filename
1.tooltip: Path and filename of the saved latent

XMath.description: A node for mathematical calculations supporting both integers and floats

XVideoSave.description: A node for saving image sequences as lossless video

images.name: Images
images.tooltip: The image sequence to save as video

filename_prefix.name: Filename Prefix
filename_prefix.tooltip: Video filename prefix with support for tokens like %date%, %time%, %seed%, etc.

fps.name: Frame Rate (FPS)
fps.tooltip: Frames per second for the video

use_custom_folder.name: Use Custom Folder
use_custom_folder.tooltip: Whether to use a custom folder

folder.name: Custom Folder Name
folder.tooltip: Custom save folder, supports creating subfolders like: Videos/Animation

0.name: Saved Path
0.tooltip: Path where the video was saved
